resources.string: This is a short quiz about the Agile framework Scrum. Do you know all answers? Try yourself.
Scrum is an Agile framework and, as such, is consistent with the values of the Agile Manifesto. Which of the following two statements is the right one?
Following a plan over responding to change
Responding to change over following a plan

The self-organized team has a clear idea of what will define a piece of work as being completed , ensuring that everyone on the team knows exactly what is expected of everything the team delivers. This is called the
All work performed in Scrum needs a set of values as the foundation for the team\'s processes and interactions. How many Scrum values are defined?
How is the meeting called where the Scrum Team presents the completed work to the stakeholders?
Check each role who is the owner of the Sprint Backlog?
